variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the VPC instance

variables.name: internal_cidr
variables.description: The cidr range of the internal network for the AWS VPC. Either provide manually or chose from AWS IPAM poolsÃŸ

variables.name: external_cidr
variables.description: The cidr range of the external network for the AWS VPC.

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the instance should be provisioned. If false then an existing instance will be looked up

variables.name: instance_tenancy
variables.description: Instance is shared / dedicated, etc. #[default, dedicated, host]

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix to be added to the names of resources which are being provisioned

variables.name: enable_dns_support
variables.description: default is true. [true, false]]

variables.name: enable_dns_hostnames
variables.description: Default is true. [true, false]]. ROSA cluster requires this to be set as true

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group where the VPC is deployed. On AWS this value becomes a tag.

outputs.name: vpc_id
outputs.description: The id for the vpc network

outputs.name: vpc_arn
outputs.description: The arn of the vpc

outputs.name: default_network_acl_id
outputs.description: The id for the default network acl

outputs.name: default_security_group_id
outputs.description: The id of the default security group.

outputs.name: default_security_group_arn
outputs.description: The arn of the default security group.

outputs.name: vpc_cidr
outputs.description: The internal vpc cidr.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the IGW instance

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix to be added to the names of resources which are being provisioned

variables.name: vpc_name
variables.description: The name of the VPC instance

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group where the VPC is deployed. On AWS this value becomes a tag.

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag to determine whether to provision Internet gateway or not. Defautl set to true

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group where the VPC is deployed. On AWS this value becomes a tag.

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix to be added to the names of resources which are being provisioned

variables.name: description
variables.description: The description of the key as viewed in AWS console.

variables.name: key_spec
variables.description: Specifies whether the key contains a symmetric key or an asymmetric key pair and the encryption algorithms or signing algorithms that the key supports. Valid values: SYMMETRIC_DEFAULT, RSA_2048, RSA_3072, RSA_4096, ECC_NIST_P256, ECC_NIST_P384, ECC_NIST_P521, or ECC_SECG_P256K1

variables.name: enabled
variables.description: Specifies whether the key is enabled.

variables.name: policy_file
variables.description: Specifies the file name for kms policy.

variables.name: rotation_enabled
variables.description: Specifies whether key rotation is enabled.

variables.name: alias
variables.description: The display name of the key.

variables.name: kms_alias
variables.description: The description of the key alias as viewed in AWS console

outputs.name: key_arn
outputs.description: Key ARN

outputs.name: key_id
outputs.description: Key ID

outputs.name: alias_arn
outputs.description: Alias ARN

outputs.name: alias_name
outputs.description: Alias name

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Provision Subnet if  true.

variables.name: region
variables.description: Please set the region where the resouces to be created

variables.name: multi-zone
variables.description: Create subnets in multiple zones

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group where the VPC is deployed. On AWS this value becomes a tag.

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix to be added to the names of resources which are being provisioned

variables.name: label
variables.description: label to define type of subnet

variables.name: gateways
variables.description: List of gateway ids and zones

variables.name: vpc_name
variables.description: (Required) The VPC name.

variables.name: subnet_cidrs
variables.description: (Required) The CIDR block for the  subnet.

variables.name: availability_zones
variables.description: List of availability zone ids

variables.name: customer_owned_ipv4_pool
variables.description: Type of the subnet: Public / Private

variables.name: map_customer_owned_ip_on_launch
variables.description: Specify true to indicate that network interfaces created in the subnet should be assigned a customer owned IP address. The customer_owned_ipv4_pool and  arguments must be specified when set to true. Default is false.

variables.name: map_public_ip_on_launch
variables.description: (Optional) Specify true to indicate that instances launched into the subnet should be assigned a public IP address. Default is fals

variables.name: subnet_cidrs

variables.name: availability_zones
variables.description: List of availability zone ids

variables.name: customer_owned_ipv4_pool
variables.description: Type of the subnet: Public / Private

variables.name: map_customer_owned_ip_on_launch
variables.description: Specify true to indicate that network interfaces created in the subnet should be assigned a customer owned IP address. The customer_owned_ipv4_pool and  arguments must be specified when set to true. Default is false.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the NGW instance

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix to be added to the names of resources which are being provisioned

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group where the VPC is deployed. On AWS this value becomes a tag.

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag to determine whether to provision Internet gateway or not. Defautl set to true

variables.name: _count
variables.description: Number of resources to be provisioned

variables.name: connectivity_type
variables.description: (Optional) Connectivity type for the gateway. Valid values are private and public. Defaults to public.

variables.name: allocation_id
variables.description: (Optional) The Allocation ID of the Elastic IP address for the gateway. Required for connectivity_type of public

variables.name: subnet_ids
variables.description: (Required) The Subnet ID of the subnet in which to place the gateway.

outputs.name: allocation_id
outputs.description: The Allocation ID of the Elastic IP address for the gateway.

outputs.name: private_ip
outputs.description: The private IP address of the NAT Gateway.

outputs.name: public_ip
outputs.description: The public IP address of the NAT Gateway.

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix to be added to the names of resources which are being provisioned

variables.name: region
variables.description: Please set the region where the resouces to be created

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: Please set the default resource group with tags

variables.name: rosa_token
variables.description: get an offline access token at https://cloud.redhat.com/openshift/token/rosa

variables.name: dry_run
variables.description: Set to true to dry the command just to verify. Else set to false to actually run the cmd

variables.name: existing_vpc
variables.description: Flag to identify if VPC already exists. Default set to true. Used to identify to pass the subnet ids to create the ROSA cluster

variables.name: cluster_name
variables.description: Name of the RedHat OpenShift Cluster

variables.name: ocp_version
variables.description: Version of OpenShift that will be used to install the cluster

variables.name: no_of_compute_nodes
variables.description: Number of worker nodes to be provisioned

variables.name: compute-machine-type
variables.description: Instance type for the compute nodes. Determines the amount of memory and vCPU allocated to each compute node. Default m5.xlarge

variables.name: machine-cidr
variables.description: ipNet Block of IP addresses used by OpenShift while installing the cluster, for example 10.0.0.0/16

variables.name: service-cidr
variables.description: ipNet Block of IP addresses for services, for example 172.30.0.0/16

variables.name: pod-cidr
variables.description: ipNet Block of IP addresses from which Pod IP addresses are allocated, for example 10.128.0.0/14

variables.name: host-prefix
variables.description: Subnet prefix length to assign to each individual node. For example, if host prefix is set to 23, then each node is assigned a /23 subnet out of the given CIDR.

variables.name: etcd-encryption
variables.description: Add etcd encryption. By default etcd data is encrypted at rest. This option configures etcd encryption on top of existing storage encryption.

variables.name: subnet_ids
variables.description: To create cluster in existing VPC, public and private Subnet ids should be given .

variables.name: public_subnet_ids
variables.description: To create cluster in existing VPC, public and private Subnet ids should be given .

variables.name: private_subnet_ids
variables.description: To create cluster in existing VPC, public and private Subnet ids should be given .

variables.name: multi-zone-cluster
variables.description: Deploy to multiple data centers

variables.name: private-link
variables.description: Provides private connectivity between VPCs, AWS services, and your on-premises networks, without exposing your traffic to the public internet

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: ID of the cluster.

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: Name of the cluster.

outputs.name: resource_group_name
outputs.description: Name of the resource group containing the cluster.

outputs.name: region
outputs.description: Region containing the cluster.

outputs.name: server_url
outputs.description: The url used to connect to the api server. If the cluster has public endpoints enabled this will be the public api server, otherwise this will be the private api server url

outputs.name: console_url
outputs.description: The url of the OCP console.

outputs.name: config_file_path
outputs.description: Path to the config file for the cluster.

outputs.name: token
outputs.description: The admin user token used to generate the cluster

outputs.name: username
outputs.description: The username of the admin user for the cluster

outputs.name: password
outputs.description: The password of the admin user for the cluster

outputs.name: domainname
outputs.description: The domain name  for the cluster
